2.text: Pick free leaves from the broccoli.

3.text: Cut the florets free beneath the flower canopy.

5.text: Continue to cut the florets moving inward.

6.text: Trim the stems of your florets to an even length.

7.text: Cut your florets into smaller pieces, if desired.

8.text: Remove the inedible, bottom part of the stalk.

9.text: Use a vegetable peeler to remove tough skin.

10.text: Cut your stalks into thin sticks.
